verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Found love beyond all reason newline You gave your life, your all for me newline And called me your forever newline Caught in the mercy fall out newline I found hope, found life, found all I need newline You're all I need

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: The time has come newline To stand for all we believe in newline So I for one newline Am gonna give my praise to you (Jesus)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Today, Today it's all or nothing newline All the way the praise goes out to you newline Yeah, the praise goes out to you newline Today, Today I live for one thing newline To give you praise and everything I do newline Yeah, all the praise goes out to you

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: All we are is yours newline And all we're living for newline Is all you are newline Is all that you are newline Lord
